content: X-SW 60 Soft washer with nail Plastic membrane washer with pre-mounted nail, for attaching waterproofing membrane to concrete or masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Plastic washer design helps to prevent tearing or ripping of thin or soft membranes Flexible, soft membrane washer conforms to uneven surfaces 60 mm soft washer – provides large bearing surface for superior clamping of thin and delicate membranes Applications Attach waterproofing membrane to concrete or masonry Attach plastic sheeting to concrete or masonry Attach thin membranes (up to 25.4 mm) to concrete or masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Water proofing For use with (tools): DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Application | Water proofing | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Coastal areas, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution, Close proximity to roads, Special applications | Diameter | 2-3/8 in | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete, Steel, Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3506897 -
